Title: Azure SQL input binding for Azure Functions
Description: This post is about Azure SQL input binding for Azure Functions - this feature is preview right now. The input binding helps us to read data from SQL Server in Azure Functions. To write to SQL Server we need to use the Output binding. Azure function now offers SQL trigger as well, we will be discussing this in a later post.
